alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range Foothills; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:56PM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 40 to 50 MPH with gusts of 70 to 80 MPH. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin, Central Carbon County, Upper North Platte River Basin, Laramie Valley and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Very strong crosswinds will create dangerous travel for motorists on Interstate 80 and north to south oriented highways such as Highway 287 especially those with light weight and high profile vehicles including camper trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range Foothills; Upper North Platte River Basin
